title: Can my HUAWEI MediaPad T1 7.0 function as a USB host? Can it work with an external USB flash drive, mouse, or printer?
answer: Your HUAWEI MediaPad T1 7.0 can function as a USB host. You can connect it to a USB flash drive, mouse, or keyboard using a USB On-The-Go (OTG) cable. However, it cannot be connected to a printer.
